TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistryAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryAccessRule Inherits AccessRule

summary.span: 表示一组允许或拒绝用户或组进行访问的权限。

span.span: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 .NET Framework 提供的一组类中的一组, 用于管理注册表项的 Windows 访问控制安全性。The class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on registry keys. 有关这些类的概述及其与基础 Windows 访问控制结构的关系, 请参阅。For an overview of these classes, and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see . > [!NOTE] > Windows 访问控制安全性只能应用于注册表项。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它不能应用于存储在键中的各个键/值对。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. 若要获取当前应用于注册表项的规则列表, 请使用方法获取对象, 然后使用其方法来获取对象的集合。To get a list of the rules currently applied to a registry key, use the method to get a object, and then use its method to obtain a collection of objects. 对象不会将一对一映射到基础自由随机控制访问列表 (DACL) 中的访问控制项。 objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary control access list (DACL). 获取注册表项的所有访问规则集时, 该集包含当前用于表示所有访问控制项所需的最小规则数。When you get the set of all access rules for a registry key, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries. > [!NOTE] > 在应用和删除规则时, 基础访问控制项会更改。The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules. 如果可能, 将合并规则中的信息以保持最小数量的访问控制项。The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries. 因此, 当您阅读当前的规则列表时, 它可能看起来与您添加的所有规则的列表并不完全相同。Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added. 使用对象指定对用户或组允许或拒绝的访问权限。Use objects to specify access rights to allow or deny to a user or group. 对象始终表示允许的访问权限或拒绝访问, 这两种方法都不会。A object always represents either allowed access or denied access, never both. 若要将规则应用于注册表项, 请使用方法来获取对象。To apply a rule to a registry key, use the method to get the object. 通过使用对象的方法添加规则来修改对象, 然后使用方法重新附加安全对象。 Modify the object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the method to reattach the security object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对对象所做的更改不会影响注册表项的访问级别, 直到调用方法将已更改的安全对象分配给注册表项。 Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 对象是不可变的。 objects are immutable. 使用类的方法来修改注册表项的安全性, 以添加或删除规则; 执行此操作时, 将修改基础访问控制项。Security for a registry key is modified using the methods of the class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用继承和传播的访问规则。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 该示例创建一个对象, 然后创建并添加两个具有标志的规则。The example creates a object, then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一个规则没有传播标志, 而第二条具有和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 该程序将在对象中显示规则, 然后使用对象创建子项。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 该程序创建一个子子项和一个孙级子项, 然后显示每个子项的安全性。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, and then displays the security for each subkey. 最后, 程序删除测试密钥。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数指定默认的传播和继承。This constructor specifies default propagation and inheritance. 即和。That is, and . 此构造函数等效于通过传递 `identity`到构造函数并将新创建的对象传递给构造函数来创建对象。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建了注册表访问规则并将其添加到了一个对象中, 其中显示了允许和拒绝权限的规则如何保持独立, 同时合并了相同类型的兼容规则。The following code example creates registry access rules and adds them to a object, showing how rules that allow and deny rights remain separate, while compatible rules of the same kind are merged. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定此规则应用到的用户或组、访问权限、传播标志以及是否允许或拒绝指定的访问权限。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, the inheritance flags, the propagation flags, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有注册表项都是容器, 因此对于注册表项有意义的唯一继承标志是标志。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定此标志, 则会忽略传播标志, 并且仅影响直接密钥。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果该标志存在, 则将按下表所示传播规则。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 该表假设有一个具有子子项 CS 和孙子项 GS 的子项。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是说, 孙级子项的路径为 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |传播标志Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |， , ||XX|| 孙子项的模式控制孙级子项包含的所有子项。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如, 如果为`inheritanceFlags`指定了标志并且为指定`propagationFlags`了传播标志, 则此规则不会应用于直接子项, 而是应用于其所有直接子子项和所有子项它们包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以为 `inheritanceFlags`指定标志, 但没有任何一点要这样做。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 出于访问控制的目的, 子项中的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 对名称/值对的访问权限由子项的权限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外, 由于所有子项均为容器 (也就是说, 它们可以包含其他子项), 因此它们不会受到标志的影响。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后, 指定标志不必要地使规则维护复杂化, 因为它会干扰其他兼容规则的组合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the combination of otherwise compatible rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有注册表项都是容器, 因此对于注册表项有意义的唯一继承标志是标志。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定此标志, 则会忽略传播标志, 并且仅影响直接密钥。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果该标志存在, 则将按下表所示传播规则。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 该表假设有一个具有子子项 CS 和孙子项 GS 的子项。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是说, 孙级子项的路径为 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |传播标志Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |， , ||XX|| 孙子项的模式控制孙级子项包含的所有子项。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如, 如果为`inheritanceFlags`指定了标志并且为指定`propagationFlags`了传播标志, 则此规则不会应用于直接子项, 而是应用于其所有直接子子项和所有子项它们包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以为 `inheritanceFlags`指定标志, 但没有任何一点要这样做。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 出于访问控制的目的, 子项中的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 对名称/值对的访问权限由子项的权限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外, 由于所有子项均为容器 (也就是说, 它们可以包含其他子项), 因此它们不会受到标志的影响。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后, 指定标志不必要地使规则维护复杂化, 因为它会干扰其他兼容规则的组合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the combination of otherwise compatible rules. 此构造函数等效于通过传递 `identity`到构造函数并将新创建的对象传递给构造函数来创建对象。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用继承和传播的访问规则。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 该示例创建一个对象, 然后创建并添加两个具有标志的规则。The example creates a object, and then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一个规则没有传播标志, 而第二条具有和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 该程序将在对象中显示规则, 然后使用对象创建子项。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 该程序创建一个子子项和一个孙级子项, 然后显示每个子项的规则。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, and then displays the rules for each subkey. 最后, 程序删除测试密钥。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RegistryRights As RegistryRights

summary.span: 获取访问规则允许或拒绝的权限。

span.span: Gets the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.

value.span: 值的按位组合，它指示访问规则允许或拒绝的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values indicating the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变的。 objects are immutable. 您可以创建表示不同用户、不同权限或不同的新访问规则, 但不能修改现有的访问规则。You can create a new access rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different , but you cannot modify an existing access rule.
